sentences.sContent: Singapore seceded from the Federation of Malaysia and became an independent sovereign state.
sentences.sCn: 新加坡脱离马来西亚联邦成为一个独立的主权国家。

trans.tranCn: 正式脱离或退出, 分离
trans.tranOther: if a country or state secedes from another country, it officially stops being part of it and becomes independent
